biocontainers.name: ceas
biocontainers.summary: Cis-regulatory element annotation system (ceas) is a resource for chip-chip analyses that retrieves repeat-masked genomic sequences, calculates gc content, plots evolutionary conservation, maps nearby genes, and identifies enriched transcription factor binding (tfbs) motifs.

biotools.summary: Cis-regulatory Element Annotation System (CEAS) is a resource for ChIP-chip analyses that retrieves repeat-masked genomic sequences, calculates GC content, plots evolutionary conservation, maps nearby genes, and identifies enriched transcription factor binding (TFBS) motifs.
